content:
One nice feature with some other forums is the ability to get an AI generated summary of topics that have lots of replies. I know that Zulip has yet to incorporate AI, however is there a simple way to get all of the post for a really long topic so that I can paste it into an LLM such as ChatGPT and ask for summary. The topic I considering is

#Equational > 1485

I know I can use copy and paste, however with a really long topic it sometimes take a few attempts to capture it all without the cursor changing when scrolling.

I have no specific idea (and hope Zulip never integrates any AI :) but I'd probably start by generating an API key and then presumably you can pull the topic via the API and pass its contents wherever you like.
In fact for a public channel I wonder whether just adding the link to NotebookLM does anything useful on its own.
We are starting work towards an AI summaries feature. If you have feedback on how you'd like it to work, it would be great to hear. Discussion here.
